content.rendered:
SSCSD Email Access

Microsoft Office 365 Link

Clever

Clever Login – Access to learning software and instructional resources

Frontline

Frontline – Absence management and professional growth (formerly My Learning Plan)

IT Tickets & Device Help

Submit an IT Ticket through IncidentIQ.

ParentSquare

ParentSquare Login

SchoolTool

SchoolTool Login Link –  Student Management System

Employee Links and Documents

Staff Links and Resources Site Link – You must be logged into Office365 with your SSCSD email account to view the Staff Links and Resources Site.  The site has important links as well as documents for human resources, payroll, professional development, and more.

Educational Technology Support

Educational Technology Website

SchoolFront

SchoolFront – Internal job postings, change of information forms

Workplace Violence Prevention Program

Click here to view the Workplace Violence Prevention Program Folder.

Our district is dedicated to fostering a safe and inclusive environment for all members of our community. We prioritize preventing and addressing violence through established systems and structures.
